attributes.action: Introduce LGBT literature into high schools to normalise and value that culture
attributes.background: I have seen too many times children being bullied in high school for being gay by children who don't understand the term. We should introduce LGBT literature so children can understand that LGBT relationships are as valued and "normal" as heterosexual relationships without outright teaching them.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of schools and not the UK Government or Parliament.
